page.title: 20CHRCH FRM FARMING CONCERNS
page.content: Though the farm is up to date you can still see a{daub and wattle wall}and hand made bricks. It covers 160 acres with 100{Freisians}and{70 young stock .It is run by the farmer with 2 workers and 1 student. The student is important for farming's future. About 120 cows are born a year with 7 sets of twins. The cows produce{600,000 {litres of milk annually.}The farmer is not a vegetarian but loves his animals and send them directly for slaughter rather than being prodded and frightened at market. His favourite parts of farming are being with animals, having a different job to do each day, taking a pride in what he is doing. He dislikes getting up early on a cold winter's day.
